author: Nick Nairn
method: Heat the oil in a medium saucepan and sauté the pepper slices for 3-4 minutes, to soften. Stir in the tomatoes and heat for a further few minutes.  Add the chicken stock, bring to the boil, then reduce the heat and simmer gently for 8-10 minutes. Stir in the basil and season well with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Transfer to a serving bowl and drizzle with a little olive oil, to serve.
ingredients: 1-2 tbsp olive oil,  ½ red pepper, sliced,  85g/3oz sun-blushed tomatoes,  ½pint chicken stock (vegetarians can substitute vegetable stock),  handful of fresh basil leaves,  salt and freshly ground black pepper,  drizzle of olive oil
